item.title: Darin Gaub to Newsmax: Trump Should Be 'Fully' Backed on Gaza Rebuild
item.description: Retired U.S. Army Lt. Col. Darin Gaub told Newsmax on Monday that President Donald Trump should be backed "fully" on Gaza rebuild.

item.title: PBS Shutters DEI Office, Adheres to Trump Directive
item.description: PBS, which receives federal funding through the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, has closed its diversity, equity, and inclusion office.
